description: Work can be stressful, especially when your boss is a perverse and pitiless trainer. Degradation reaches a new height when Goddess Brandon makes an employee her new pet. As brutal as she is beautiful, nothing seems to satisfy her hunger to humiliate. To his knees, stripped of clothes and dignity alike, his collar and leash merely solidify the fact that he is and always will be subhuman to her. Whipping, foot gagging, and crawling on all-fours only scratch the surface of what she plans to make him do. This new arrangement has a tight leash, and unless he’d like the world to see what a pathetic dog he truly is via life-ruining photos, he will obey every command and welcome his new life as her pet.
title: Blackmailed At The Office
